```{r include=FALSE}
plover_punctuation <- read_csv("plover_punctuation.csv")
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
plover_punctuation %>% 
  mutate(Uses_Star = if_else(Uses_Star,
                             as.character(emo::ji("check")),
                             as.character(emo::ji("multiplication")))) %>% 
  datatable(rownames = FALSE,
            options = list(pageLength = 56,
                           lengthChange = FALSE),
            escape = "Uses_Star")
```
